Package com.FoodDeliveryManagementSystem.BusinessLogic

Class DeliveryService

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
com.FoodDeliveryManagementSystem.BusinessLogic.DeliveryService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDeliveryServiceProcessing
public class DeliveryService
extends java.util.Observable
implements IDeliveryServiceProcessing
The delivery service class is a singleton which holds one single item of type DeliveryService and makes it available to all the presentations of the application.
